entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

Observed at: North Cowichan 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Temperature: 7.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
